GCODING.item: READ TABLE it_mseg INTO wa_mseg INDEX 1.
READ TABLE it_mkpf INTO wa_mkpf INDEX 1.
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM it_marm COMPARING ALL FIELDS.
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM it_makt COMPARING ALL FIELDS.
IF WA_FINAL-ALQTY IS INITIAL. "AND WA_FINAL-MEINH IS INITIAL.
READ TABLE it_makt INTO wa_makt WITH KEY matnr = wa_final-matnr.
